title: 'Template Examples'
description: 'Real-world template customization examples'
---

# Template Examples

This page provides practical examples of customizing Mintlify-TSdocs templates for different use cases.

## Getting Started with Templates

### Initialize Template Directory

Start by creating a template directory with default templates:

```bash
# Create templates in default location (./templates)
mintlify-tsdocs init-templates

# Create templates in custom directory
mintlify-tsdocs init-templates --template-dir ./my-templates

# Overwrite existing templates
mintlify-tsdocs init-templates --template-dir ./my-templates --force
```

This will create a directory with all the default Liquid templates that you can customize.

## Custom API Documentation Style

Create a modern, clean documentation style with enhanced typography and better organization:

### Custom Layout (`layout.liquid`)

```liquid
---
title: "{{ page.title }}"
{% if page.icon %}icon: "{{ page.icon }}"{% endif %}
description: "{{ page.description }}"
---

<div className="api-header">
  {% if page.breadcrumb and page.breadcrumb.size > 0 %}
  <nav className="breadcrumb">
    {% for item in page.breadcrumb %}
      {% unless forloop.first %}
        <span className="breadcrumb-separator">/</span>
      {% endunless %}
      {% if item.path %}
        <a href="{{ item.path }}">{{ item.name }}</a>
      {% else %}
        <span className="breadcrumb-current">{{ item.name }}</span>
      {% endif %}
    {% endfor %}
  </nav>
  {% endif %}

  <h1 className="api-title">{{ apiItem.displayName }}</h1>
  <span className="api-kind">{{ apiItem.kind }}</span>
</div>

{% if apiItem.isDeprecated %}
<div className="warning deprecated">
  <Icon icon="warning" /> **Deprecated**: This {{ apiItem.kind | downcase }} is deprecated.
</div>
{% endif %}

{% if apiItem.isAlpha %}
<div className="warning alpha">
  <Icon icon="flask" /> **Alpha**: This {{ apiItem.kind | downcase }} is in alpha.
</div>
{% endif %}

{% if apiItem.isBeta %}
<div className="warning beta">
  <Icon icon="test-tube" /> **Beta**: This {{ apiItem.kind | downcase }} is in beta.
</div>
{% endif %}

<div className="api-content">
  {{ body }}
</div>
```

### Enhanced Class Template (`class.liquid`)

```liquid
{% include 'layout' with apiItem: apiItem, page: page, navigation: navigation, examples: examples, heritageTypes: heritageTypes, body: class_content %}

{% capture class_content %}
<div className="class-overview">
  {% if apiItem.summary %}
  <div className="summary">
    {{ apiItem.summary }}
  </div>
  {% endif %}

  {% if apiItem.signature %}
  <div className="signature-box">
    <pre><code className="language-typescript">{{ apiItem.signature }}</code></pre>
  </div>
  {% endif %}

  {% if heritageTypes and heritageTypes.size > 0 %}
  <div className="inheritance">
    <h3>Inheritance</h3>
    <div className="inheritance-tree">
      {% for type in heritageTypes %}
        {% if type.path %}
          <a href="{{ type.path }}" className="inheritance-link">{{ type.name }}</a>
        {% else %}
          <span className="inheritance-item">{{ type.name }}</span>
        {% endif %}
        {% unless forloop.last %}
          <span className="inheritance-arrow">‚Üí</span>
        {% endunless %}
      {% endfor %}
    </div>
  </div>
  {% endif %}
</div>

{% if constructors and constructors.size > 0 %}
<section className="constructors-section">
  <h2>üèóÔ∏è Constructors</h2>
  <div className="constructors-grid">
    {% for row in constructors %}
    <div className="constructor-card">
      <h3 className="constructor-name">{{ row.title }}</h3>
      {% if row.modifiers and row.modifiers.size > 0 %}
      <div className="constructor-modifiers">
        {% for modifier in row.modifiers %}
          <span className="modifier-tag">{{ modifier }}</span>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      {% endif %}
      {% if row.description %}
      <div className="constructor-description">{{ row.description }}</div>
      {% endif %}
    </div>
    {% endfor %}
  </div>
</section>
{% endif %}

{% if properties and properties.size > 0 %}
<section className="properties-section">
  <h2>üìã Properties</h2>
  <div className="properties-table">
    <table>
      <thead>
        <tr>
          <th>Property</th>
          <th>Type</th>
          <th>Description</th>
        </tr>
      </thead>
      <tbody>
        {% for row in properties %}
        <tr className="{% if row.isDeprecated %}deprecated{% endif %} {% if row.isInherited %}inherited{% endif %}">
          <td className="property-name">
            <code>{{ row.title }}</code>
            {% if row.isOptional %}
              <span className="optional-badge">optional</span>
            {% endif %}
            {% if row.isInherited %}
              <span className="inherited-badge">inherited</span>
            {% endif %}
          </td>
          <td className="property-type">
            {% if row.typePath %}
              <a href="{{ row.typePath }}"><code>{{ row.type }}</code></a>
            {% else %}
              <code>{{ row.type }}</code>
            {% endif %}
          </td>
          <td className="property-description">{{ row.description }}</td>
        </tr>
        {% endfor %}
      </tbody>
    </table>
  </div>
</section>
{% endif %}

{% if methods and methods.size > 0 %}
<section className="methods-section">
  <h2>‚öôÔ∏è Methods</h2>
  {% for row in methods %}
  <div className="method-card" id="method-{{ row.title | kebab_case }}">
    <h3 className="method-name">{{ row.title }}</h3>
    {% if row.modifiers and row.modifiers.size > 0 %}
    <div className="method-modifiers">
      {% for modifier in row.modifiers %}
        <span className="modifier-tag {{ modifier | downcase }}">{{ modifier }}</span>
      {% endfor %}
    </div>
    {% endif %}
    {% if row.description %}
    <div className="method-description">{{ row.description }}</div>
    {% endif %}
  </div>
  {% endfor %}
</section>
{% endif %}
{% endcapture %}
```

## Component-Based Templates

Create reusable components with Liquid includes:

### Component: `_param-table.liquid`

```liquid
{% comment %}
  Renders a parameter table with consistent styling
  Usage: {% include 'param-table' with params: parameters %}
{% endcomment %}

{% if params and params.rows.size > 0 %}
<div className="param-table">
  <table>
    <thead>
      <tr>
        <th>Parameter</th>
        <th>Type</th>
        <th>Description</th>
      </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
      {% for param in params.rows %}
      <tr className="{% if param.isOptional %}optional{% endif %}">
        <td className="param-name">
          <code>{{ param.title }}</code>
          {% if param.isOptional %}
            <span className="optional-indicator">?</span>
          {% endif %}
        </td>
        <td className="param-type"><code>{{ param.type }}</code></td>
        <td className="param-description">{{ param.description }}</td>
      </tr>
      {% endfor %}
    </tbody>
  </table>
</div>
{% endif %}
```

### Using the Component

```liquid
{% include 'param-table' with params: tables.parameters %}
```

## API Reference with Categories

Organize APIs by categories with custom grouping:

```liquid
{% comment %}
  Custom package template that groups items by category
{% endcomment %}

{% include 'layout' with apiItem: apiItem, page: page, navigation: navigation, examples: examples, heritageTypes: heritageTypes, body: package_content %}

{% capture package_content %}
{% assign categories = "Classes,Interfaces,Functions,Types,Variables" | split: "," %}

{% for category in categories %}
  {% assign category_lower = category | downcase %}
  {% assign table_key = category_lower | append: "s" %}
  {% assign table_data = tables[table_key] %}

  {% if table_data and table_data.rows.size > 0 %}
  <section className="category-section {{ category_lower }}">
    <h2>{{ category }}</h2>
    <div className="category-items">
      {% for row in table_data.rows %}
      <div className="category-item">
        <h3><a href="{{ row.titlePath }}">{{ row.title }}</a></h3>
        {% if row.description %}
        <p className="item-description">{{ row.description | truncate: 150 }}</p>
        {% endif %}
      </div>
      {% endfor %}
    </div>
  </section>
  {% endif %}
{% endfor %}
{% endcapture %}
```

## Method Documentation with Examples

Create detailed method documentation with inline examples:

```liquid
{% comment %}
  Enhanced method template with examples and detailed info
{% endcomment %}

{% include 'layout' with apiItem: apiItem, page: page, navigation: navigation, examples: examples, heritageTypes: heritageTypes, body: method_content %}

{% capture method_content %}
<div className="method-header">
  <h2>{{ apiItem.displayName }}</h2>
  <div className="method-badges">
    <span className="method-kind">{{ apiItem.kind }}</span>
    {% if apiItem.isDeprecated %}
      <span className="badge deprecated">Deprecated</span>
    {% endif %}
  </div>
</div>

{% if apiItem.signature %}
<div className="method-signature">
  <pre><code className="language-typescript">{{ apiItem.signature }}</code></pre>
</div>
{% endif %}

{% if tables.parameters and tables.parameters.rows.size > 0 %}
<section className="parameters-section">
  <h3>Parameters</h3>
  {% include 'param-table' with params: tables.parameters %}
</section>
{% endif %}

{% if tables.returns %}
<section className="returns-section">
  <h3>Returns</h3>
  <div className="return-info">
    <span className="return-type">{{ tables.returns.type }}</span>
    {% if tables.returns.description %}
    <p className="return-description">{{ tables.returns.description }}</p>
    {% endif %}
  </div>
</section>
{% endif %}

{% if examples and examples.size > 0 %}
<section className="examples-section">
  <h3>Examples</h3>
  {% for example in examples %}
  <div className="example-block">
    <div className="example-header">Example {{ forloop.index }}</div>
    <pre><code className="language-typescript">{{ example }}</code></pre>
  </div>
  {% endfor %}
</section>
{% endif %}
{% endcapture %}
```

## Responsive Tables

Create responsive tables that work well on mobile:

```liquid
{% comment %}
  Responsive property table
{% endcomment %}

<div className="responsive-table">
  <table className="properties-table">
    <thead>
      <tr>
        <th className="col-property">Property</th>
        <th className="col-type">Type</th>
        <th className="col-description">Description</th>
      </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
      {% for row in tables.properties.rows %}
      <tr className="property-row {% if row.isDeprecated %}deprecated{% endif %}">
        <td className="property-cell">
          <div className="property-name">
            <code>{{ row.title }}</code>
            {% if row.isOptional %}
              <span className="badge optional">optional</span>
            {% endif %}
          </div>
          <div className="property-meta mobile-only">
            {% if row.type %}
              <span className="meta-type">{{ row.type }}</span>
            {% endif %}
          </div>
        </td>
        <td className="type-cell desktop-only">
          {% if row.typePath %}
            <a href="{{ row.typePath }}" className="type-link"><code>{{ row.type }}</code></a>
          {% else %}
            <code>{{ row.type }}</code>
          {% endif %}
        </td>
        <td className="description-cell">
          <div className="description-content">{{ row.description }}</div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      {% endfor %}
    </tbody>
  </table>
</div>

<style>
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .properties-table .desktop-only { display: none; }
  .properties-table .mobile-only { display: block; }
}
@media (min-width: 769px) {
  .properties-table .mobile-only { display: none; }
}
</style>
```

## Advanced Filtering and Sorting

Implement custom sorting and filtering logic:

```liquid
{% comment %}
  Sort methods by visibility (public first), then alphabetically
{% endcomment %}

{% if tables.methods and tables.methods.rows.size > 0 %}
<section className="methods-section">
  <h2>Methods</h2>

  {% comment %} Sort methods: public first, then protected, then private {% endcomment %}
  {% assign public_methods = "" | split: "" %}
  {% assign protected_methods = "" | split: "" %}
  {% assign private_methods = "" | split: "" %}

  {% for method in tables.methods.rows %}
    {% if method.modifiers contains "private" %}
      {% assign private_methods = private_methods | push: method %}
    {% elsif method.modifiers contains "protected" %}
      {% assign protected_methods = protected_methods | push: method %}
    {% else %}
      {% assign public_methods = public_methods | push: method %}
    {% endif %}
  {% endfor %}

  {% if public_methods.size > 0 %}
  <div className="method-category public-methods">
    <h3>Public Methods</h3>
    {% for method in public_methods %}
      {% include 'method-card' with method: method %}
    {% endfor %}
  </div>
  {% endif %}

  {% if protected_methods.size > 0 %}
  <div className="method-category protected-methods">
    <h3>Protected Methods</h3>
    {% for method in protected_methods %}
      {% include 'method-card' with method: method %}
    {% endfor %}
  </div>
  {% endif %}

  {% if private_methods.size > 0 %}
  <div className="method-category private-methods">
    <h3>Private Methods</h3>
    {% for method in private_methods %}
      {% include 'method-card' with method: method %}
    {% endfor %}
  </div>
  {% endif %}
</section>
{% endif %}
```

## Tips for Template Development

1. **Start simple**: Begin with basic templates and gradually add complexity
2. **Test incrementally**: Override one template at a time
3. **Use includes**: Create reusable components for consistency
4. **Handle edge cases**: Always check if data exists before using it
5. **Add comments**: Document complex logic in your templates
6. **Version control**: Keep templates in your repository
7. **Test with real data**: Use actual API data to test templates

## Common Patterns

### Conditional Rendering
```liquid
{% if apiItem.isDeprecated %}
  <div className="deprecated-notice">‚ö†Ô∏è Deprecated{% enddiv %}
{% endif %}
```

### Loop with Index
```liquid
{% for example in examples %}
  <h4>Example {{ forloop.index }}</h4>
  <pre><code>{{ example }}</code></pre>
{% endfor %}
```

### Default Values
```liquid
{{ apiItem.description | default: "No description available." }}
```

### Complex Conditionals
```liquid
{% if row.modifiers and row.modifiers.size > 0 and row.modifiers contains "static" %}
  <span className="static-indicator">static</span>
{% endif %}
```

These examples should give you a solid foundation for creating custom templates that match your documentation style and requirements. Remember to test your templates with real API data to ensure they work correctly with your specific use case."}"}'" > /work/hyperdev/apps/mintlify-tsdocs/docs/templates/examples.mdx
